snippet: A survey by the Library of Congress reports that 70 percent of the features made from 1912 to 1929 cannot be found.
abstract: A survey by the Library of Congress reports that 70 percent of the features made from 1912 to 1929 cannot be found.

headline.main: Majority of Silent Films Are Lost, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Majority of Silent Films Are Lost, Study Finds
